name: X (Formerly Twitter)
natural_language_description: 这是 X (Formerly Twitter) 节点。主要用于: Consume Twitter API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: tweet

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create or reply a tweet

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The ID of the user who should receive the direct message
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: The ID of the user who should receive the direct message | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.description: The text of the status update. URL encode as necessary. t.co link wrapping will affect character counts.
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The text of the status update. URL encode as necessary. t.co link wrapping will affect character counts. | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: trimUser (值: None) - Whether each tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object including only the status authors numerical ID

tweetId.name: tweetId
tweetId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tweet ID | 作用: The ID of the tweet | (必填项)

searchText.name: searchText
searchText.description: A UTF-8, URL-encoded search query of 500 characters maximum, including operators. Queries may additionally be limited by complexity. Check the searching examples here.
searchText.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Text | 作用: A UTF-8, URL-encoded search query of 500 characters maximum, including operators. Queries may additionally be limited by complexity. Check the searching examples here. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50
